original: 《魏略》諸葛亮託付兵權予魏延，楊儀造謠魏延北上投敵，魏延深恐與戰則清白難雪，只逃不戰，被馬岱追殺。
text: "Wei Lue" Zhuge Liang entrusted the military power to Wei Yan, Yang Yi spread the rumors that Wei Yan went north to the enemy, Wei Yan was innocent of fear and war, and only fled without fighting, and was pursued and killed by Ma Dai.
